segments.text: I see the water pouring over the sink, and it’s just getting everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing in the puddle, and she doesn’t even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the floor is going to be ruined, and it’s making me feel a little sad.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies, and it’s like no one is paying attention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool, and it looks so unsafe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe no one is doing anything about this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie, and it’s like she doesn’t see the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if anyone is going to notice before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, but in here, it’s just a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone fixes this before it gets any worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
